snippet: The former deputy director of the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives has left the agency in the wake of the uproar over a gun-smuggling inquiry called Operation Fast and Furious.
abstract: William Hoover, the former deputy director of the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives, is reassigned out of the agency in the wake of the uproar over a gun-smuggling inquiry called Operation Fast and Furious.
lead_paragraph: The former deputy director of the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives has left the agency in the wake of the uproar over a gun-smuggling inquiry called Operation Fast and Furious.

headline.main: Official Leaves A.T.F. After Uproar Over Gun Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Official Leaves A.T.F. After Uproar Over Gun Inquiry

keywords.value: Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms
